overview_of_class: Covers the practices used to acquire and serve customers through direct and interactive media including direct mail, direct response advertising, email, e-commerce and social media platforms. Emphasizes the use of customer-level data to measure customer lifetime value, develop loyalty programs, manage customer relationships and evaluate the impact of communications with web analytics. Prerequisites: IMC 303 and admission to IMC Certificate Program.
name: Digital, Social and Mobile Marketing
subject: IMC
